title: Bad Cop, Worse Cop
description: Jack Larson just wants the truth. But in Black Forest, the truth can get you killed.When 16-year-old amateur sleuth Jack Larson sets out to uncover what happened to his missing classmate, Casey West, he never expects the investigation to lead him into a deadly conspiracy. With the help of his best friend, Cash McDermid, Jack edges nearer to unraveling the town’s darkest secrets—but the deeper they dig, the more perilous the situation becomes.In this thrilling companion to Black Forest, Jack and Cash find themselves hunted by corrupt cops and powerful criminals, forcing them to will they risk everything to expose the truth, or walk away before they’re silenced for good?One missing girl. Two boys in over their heads. And a town that will do anything to protect its secrets.
author: J. Scott Boyd
